_source.text: A cat sees about 6 times better than a human at night, and needs 1/6 the amount of of light that a human does - it has a layer of extra reflecting cells which absorb light.

text: A **cat** sees about 6 times **better** **than** a human at night, and needs 1/6 the amount of of **light** that a
human does - it has a layer of extra reflecting cells which absorb **light**.

_source.text: -A cat sees about six times better than a human at night because of the tapetum lucidum , a layer of extra reflecting cells which absorb light.

text: -A **cat** sees about six times **better** **than** a human at night because of the tapetum lucidum , a layer of extra reflecting cells which absorb **light**.

_source.text: A faint floody light will sometimes allow you to pick up faint reflections from eyes better than a bright spot that tends to wash out everything, and adversely affect your night vision.

bright **spot** that tends to wash out everything, and adversely affect your night vision.
